title: [QUESTION] Pdf Type1 Fonts loading
body:
Hi. I implement [Pdf rendering with SkiaSharp](https://github.com/alexandrvslv/pdf-clown) and have trouble on loading Pdf Type1 Fonts(PostScript Program) on windows by SKTypeface. 

Have you any decision? 

Test's show's that HarfBuzz can load this type of fonts. But is it possible to Draw text with HarfBuzzFace and escape SkTypeface?

comments.author: Gillibald
comments.body:
I had a quick look at this and it seems the C wrapper already has the needed functions to create a picture shader just the binding is missing the needed bits.

The C API is defined here: 
https://github.com/mono/skia/blob/xamarin-mobile-bindings/src/c/sk_shader.cpp#L37

P/Invoke: 
https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/master/binding/Binding/SkiaApi.cs#L591

And the C# Binding is defined here: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/master/binding/Binding/SKShader.cs

If you can fork SkiaSharp and create a PR against current master.

comments.author: Gillibald
comments.body: DirectWrite doesn't support Type 1 typefaces so I don't think this will ever work. It is probably time to use a newer format. Looks like FreeType isn't supporting this aswell.

comments.author: alexandrvslv
comments.body: Ok. look's like that fonts requires to implement custom text extraction for mystic encodings from 90's)
